title: League of Legends Installation time negative/ high file download
body:
(translated : estimated time - 732 minutes)

hello, my friend is trying to download League of legends on his computer because he owns a kr when he vists family in seoul. we have gone through the download many times and got results with overdownloaded files and negative estimated time. he sent me this screenshot (i am posting because he owns Kr and euw account, not na) is this normal?

edit: update - http://prntscr.com/hkj4tz

replies.body: Sometimes that can happen when there's a sort of hiccup in your connection with the patching servers, so the progress bar keeps moving even though it's not downloading at the moment. Try having your friend switching to an ethernet connection if possible but it'd also be some good troubleshooting steps to go through this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well.
